definition: children's picture story book/CL:本[ben3]
small/tiny/few/young
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
book/letter/document/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]/to write

sentences.english: Guo eat while watching the picture storybook side starch noodles.
sentences.chinese: 郭同學一邊看小人書一邊喫炒粉。

sentences.english: Not only the children but also their grandma wants to read the picture book.
sentences.chinese: 不僅孩子們想看小人書，他們的奶奶也想看。

sentences.english: I stood at a bookstand reading comic books.
sentences.chinese: 我站在一個書攤旁讀着小人書。

sentences.english: I bought the child a picture book.
sentences.chinese: 我給那孩子買了本小人書。

sentences.english: Soon our comic-book library was open to the public.
sentences.chinese: 很快我們的小人書閱覽室就對外開放了。

sentences.english: The child pasted a coloured picture in his picture-story book.
sentences.chinese: 這孩子用糨糊把一張彩圖貼在他的小人書裏了。

sentences.english: I bought a map of the world as well as some picture books.
sentences.chinese: 我買了一張世界地圖還有一些小人書。

sentences.english: Jack bought 5 picture books that cost $3 each.
sentences.chinese: 傑克買了5本小人書，每本3美元。

sentences.english: There were only cartoons and comics in Y's memories of childhood.
sentences.chinese: 回憶童年，Y能記起的只有動畫片和小人書。

to overdose on supplementary medicine/to cram too hard
to keep up with the latest fashion
Guwen Guanzhi, an anthology of essays written in Literary Chinese, compiled and edited by Wu Chucai and Wu Diaohou of Qing dynasty
lit. ripe as a melon that rolls from its vine (idiom); fig. to know fluently/to know sth inside out/to know sth by heart
lit. if it's wrong, it's wrong (idiom); to make the best after a mistake/to accept an error and adapt to it/to muddle through
War and Peace by Tolstoy 托爾斯泰|托尔斯泰
to stir-fry leftover rice/fig. to rehash the same story/to serve up the same old product
reference book
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
interlude/to cross the stage/to do sth as a mere formality/to go through the motions
to take a lot of trouble (idiom); painstaking/at the cost of a lot of effort
garage kit/action figure/model figure
horizontal setting (printing)
